I played chaos dragons in the TCG, so I wasn't hyped about this structure deck. But then I realize this deck has more potential when eclipse wyvern is realise. 

Since I faced alot of CA players , the main play of this deck was econ take there saffira then dragons rebirth it..

Also getting felgrand on the field with over 4k attack is hard for ca to deal with . Especially if u have back row .

Also vs water. Once u get arkbrave on to the field its gg. Cause once you banish there ssa an field spells. It's hard for them to respond.

P.s this deck is trash so don't play it.
